email.owners.requestResetPassword.paragr: We received a request to reset the password for the account associated with
Just a heads up, to make sure your information is safe and secure, the link will expire after 24 hours. If it's already expired, you can request a new link here:
If you didn’t request to reset your password, let us know by replying directly to this email. No changes were made to your account yet.
